abstract: South Korean prosecutors charge Kim Ki-jong with attempted murder for slashing American Ambassador Mark W Lippert with knife in February.
lead_paragraph: South Korean prosecutors on Wednesday indicted a man who slashed the American ambassador in Seoul last month, charging him with attempted murder.

headline.main: Charges Are Laid in Attack on U.S. Ambassador in South Korea
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: Charges Are Laid in Attack on U.S. Ambassador

snippet: South Korean prosecutors on Wednesday indicted a man who slashed the American ambassador in Seoul last month, charging him with attempted murder.
